mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.ci_id AS ciId, cc.name AS ciName, cc.label AS ciLabel, a.collection_name AS collectionName, a.parent_key AS parentKey, a.collect_mode AS collectMode, a.is_auto_commit AS isAutoCommit, a.last_sync_date AS lastSyncDate, a.match_mode AS matchMode, a.description, csm.id AS mappingId, csm.attr_id AS attrId, csm.rel_id AS relId, csm.direction, csm.field, csu.attr_id AS uniqueAttrId, csm.action as relAction FROM cmdb_sync_ci_collection a JOIN cmdb_sync_mapping csm on a.id = csm.ci_collection_id JOIN cmdb_ci cc ON a.ci_id = cc.id LEFT JOIN cmdb_sync_unique csu on a.id = csu.ci_collection_id WHERE a.ci_id = #{value} AND a.collect_mode = 'passive'
SELECT a.id, a.cron, a.policy_id AS policyId FROM cmdb_sync_schedule a join cmdb_sync_policy csp on a.policy_id = csp.id and csp.is_active = 1
SELECT a.id, a.cron, a.policy_id AS policyId, csp.is_active as isActive FROM cmdb_sync_schedule a join cmdb_sync_policy csp on a.policy_id = csp.id WHERE a.id = #{value}

SELECT a.id, a.ci_collection_id as ciCollectionId, a.`condition` AS conditionStr, a.is_active as isActive, a.name, a.ci_id AS ciId from cmdb_sync_policy a
and a.ci_id = #{ciId}

SELECT a.id, a.ci_collection_id AS ciCollectionId, a.is_active AS isActive, a.`condition` AS conditionStr, a.name, a.ci_id AS ciId, b.collection_name AS collectionName, c.id AS cronId, c.cron AS cron, c.policy_id AS cronPolicyId FROM cmdb_sync_policy a JOIN cmdb_sync_ci_collection b on a.ci_collection_id = b.id LEFT JOIN cmdb_sync_schedule c ON a.id = c.policy_id WHERE a.id = #{value}

SELECT a.id, a.ci_id AS ciId, b.label AS ciLabel, b.name AS ciName, a.collection_name AS collectionName, a.collect_mode AS collectMode, a.is_auto_commit AS isAutoCommit, a.match_mode AS matchMode, a.fcu, a.fcd, a.lcu, a.lcd FROM cmdb_sync_ci_collection a JOIN cmdb_ci b ON a.ci_id = b.id WHERE a.collection_name = #{value} and a.collect_mode = 'initiative'

SELECT t.*, c.id as policyId, c.name AS policyName, c.is_active AS policyIsActive, d.cron FROM ( SELECT a.id, a.ci_id AS ciId, b.label AS ciLabel, b.name AS ciName, a.collection_name AS collectionName, a.collect_mode AS collectMode, a.is_auto_commit AS isAutoCommit, a.match_mode AS matchMode, a.parent_key AS parentKey, a.fcu, a.fcd, a.lcu, a.lcd, a.last_sync_date AS lastSyncDate, a.description FROM cmdb_sync_ci_collection a JOIN cmdb_ci b ON a.ci_id = b.id
ORDER BY a.collection_name ,a.collect_mode LIMIT #{startNum}, #{pageSize} ) t LEFT JOIN cmdb_sync_policy c ON t.id = c.ci_collection_id LEFT JOIN cmdb_sync_schedule d ON c.id = d.policy_id
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cmdb_sync_ci_collection a JOIN cmdb_ci b ON a.ci_id = b.id

where.if: AND (a.collection_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR b.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR b.label LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))

mapper.update: update cmdb_sync_ci_collection SET collect_mode = #{collectMode}, is_auto_commit = #{isAutoCommit}, parent_key = #{parentKey}, match_mode = #{matchMode}, lcd = NOW(3), lcu = #{lcu}, description = #{description}, last_sync_date = null WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into cmdb_sync_schedule (id, cron, policy_id) values (#{id}, #{cron}, #{policyId})

insert into cmdb_sync_ci_collection (id, ci_id, collection_name, parent_key, match_mode, collect_mode, is_auto_commit, description, fcd, fcu) values (#{id}, #{ciId}, #{collectionName}, #{parentKey}, #{matchMode}, #{collectMode}, #{isAutoCommit}, #{description}, NOW(3), #{fcu})
insert into cmdb_sync_mapping (id, ci_collection_id, rel_id, direction, attr_id, field, action) values (#{id}, #{ciCollectionId}, #{relId}, #{direction}, #{attrId}, #{field}, #{action})
insert into cmdb_sync_policy (id, ci_id, ci_collection_id, is_active, `condition`, name) VALUES (#{id}, #{ciId}, #{ciCollectionId}, #{isActive}, #{conditionStr}, #{name})
mapper.delete: delete a,b from cmdb_sync_policy a LEFT JOIN cmdb_sync_schedule b ON a.id = b.policy_id where a.id = #{value}

delete a,b,c,d,csa from cmdb_sync_ci_collection a left join cmdb_sync_mapping b on a.id = b.ci_collection_id left join cmdb_sync_policy c on a.id = c.ci_collection_id left join cmdb_sync_schedule d on c.id = d.policy_id left join cmdb_sync_audit csa on a.id = csa.ci_collection_id where a.id = #{value}
